info.description: Allows the viewing and creation of Instruments Structure Note
info.title: Reference Instrument Structure Note APIs

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

alternateInstrumentId.description: The alternate security reference for the instrument

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from securityMaster

ISIN.description: The International Securities Identification Number of the instrument

structureNote.description: indicates if the instrument is a structured note

subAssetTypeId.description: Identifies the group of like Securities, which are reported together

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

priceType.description: Defines the calculation method to be used when calculating the price of a trade

lastPrice.description: Indicates the last recorded price of the instrument

companyDomicile.description: Specifies the country of domicile, of the parent company or government or establishment issuing the Security

instrumentDomicile.description: Specifies the country domicile of the Security being issued

priceUpdateCode.description: Specifies the type of price update that will update the price of this security

issueDate.description: The date the item was issued.

maturityDate.description: The delivery period or maturity date of the contract transacted

initialPaymentdate.description: Specifies the date on which the 1st interest payment or coupon falls due

accrualDate.description: The date to which interest has been or will be accrued to

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
